E

editMenu - Variable in class Steganography.Controller
 
embed(byte, int, int, byte) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.ImageSteganography
Hides one byte in one pixels inside the least significant bits of the pixel colors.
embed(int, char) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.GifSteganography
Embeds one bit into the least significant bit of a pixel.
encode(byte[], File) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.BaseSteganography
Encodes a byte array into a cover image.
encode(byte[], File) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.GifSteganography
Calls the GifSteganography.writeHeader(byte[]) to write the message header into the gif stego image, then encodes the message to hide using GifSteganography.hideByte(byte) byte by byte, then saves the stego gif image using GifSequenceWriter
encode(byte[], File) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.ImageSteganography
Calls BaseSteganography.setHeader(byte[]) to write the message header to the stego image, then encodes the message to hide using ImageSteganography.hideByte(byte, int, int, byte) byte by byte, then saves the stego image.
encode(File, File) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.BaseSteganography
Encodes a document file into a cover image.
encode(File, File) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.GifSteganography
Calls the GifSteganography.writeHeader(byte[]) to write the file header into the gif stego image, then encodes the file to hide using GifSteganography.hideByte(byte) byte by byte, then saves the stego gif image using GifSequenceWriter
encode(File, File) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.ImageInImageSteganography
Calls ImageSteganography.writeHeader(byte[]) to write the the image header to the stego image, then encodes the image using ImageInImageSteganography.hidePixel(int, int) pixel per pixel, then saves the stego image.
encode(File, File) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.ImageSteganography
Calls BaseSteganography.setHeader(File) to write the header to the file header to the stego image, then encodes the file to hide using ImageSteganography.hideByte(byte, int, int, byte) byte by byte, then saves the stego image.
encodeDocument - Variable in class Steganography.Controller
 
encodeDocumentInImage() - Method in class Steganography.Controller
Encodes a document in an image after compressing then encrypting it (if enabled), then calls either ImageSteganography or GifSteganography based on the cover image extension.
encodeImage - Variable in class Steganography.Controller
 
encodeImageInImage() - Method in class Steganography.Controller
Encodes an image in another image using ImageInImageSteganography.
encodeMessageInImage() - Method in class Steganography.Controller
Encodes a message in an image after compressing then encrypting it (if enabled), then calls either ImageSteganography or GifSteganography based on the cover image extension.
encrypt(byte[], String) - Static method in class Steganography.Logic.AESEncryption
Encrypts a given byte array using AES encryption.
encrypt(File, File, String) - Static method in class Steganography.Logic.AESEncryption
Encrypts a given file into another file using AES encryption.
ENCRYPT - Steganography.Types.PasswordType
Use the Encryption mode (password validation and confirmation box).
encryptDocument - Variable in class Steganography.Controller
 
encryptMessage - Variable in class Steganography.Controller
 
error(String, String) - Static method in class Steganography.Modals.AlertBox
Displays an error Alert box to display a caught error during the steganographic process.
errorLabelText - Static variable in class Steganography.Modals.PasswordPrompt
Error label displayed when PasswordPrompt.validatePassword(String, String) returns false.
extension - Variable in class Steganography.Logic.HiddenData
Hidden data extension.
extract(int, int, byte) - Method in class Steganography.Logic.ImageSteganography
Reveals one byte hidden inside the (i, j) pixel.
